rows.label: qst502008_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, that weird machine is pretty
unusual, right?

rows.label: qst502008_msg0002
rows.name:
It was hauled up by a salvager,
but nobody knows what it's for.

rows.label: qst502008_msg0003
rows.name:
My dad reckons it's not broken or
anything, but he can't figure out
what to do with it.

rows.label: qst502008_msg0004
rows.name:
Apparently a lot of these salvaged
machines start working when you
give them lightning energy.

rows.label: qst502008_msg0005
rows.name:
But nobody in Avaritia has enough
lightning energy to make this one work.

rows.label: qst502008_msg0006
rows.name:
If you think you can do better,
why not give it a try?

rows.label: qst502008_msg0101
rows.name:
I wonder what that weird machine
would do if it started working?

rows.label: qst502008_msg0102
rows.name:
My dad reckons it's not broken or
anything, but he's at a loss as to
what it's actually for.

rows.label: qst502008_msg0103
rows.name:
You guys can make it work using
lightning energy, right?

rows.label: qst502008_msg0104
rows.name: It should make for an exciting evening!
